description:

author: Xbox
description:
COWABUNGA, Xbox fans! The wait is over, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate has officially landed on Xbox Series X, Series S and Xbox One, ready for you to jump in and help the Turtles rescue Splinter!
To celebrate the launch of Splintered Fate, we’re excited to announce a special offer: the Casey Jones DLC is free for all Xbox players for a limited time! There’s never been a better time to jump in, simply buy the game and DLC bundle for a discounted price, and Casey Jones plus the Junkyard level are yours to keep forever. But don’t wait too long -the offer ends on July 8th, so don’t miss out!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles-splintered-fate/9nm22mrrmx6z

author: Xbox
description:
Today, in collaboration with @MetaQuestVR, we are excited to announce the launch of the Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition. The Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition limited edition release- the first limited edition ever for Quest - is part of our ongoing partnership and celebrates the expansion of Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta) on Meta Quest headsets. 

This bundle includes: 
- Custom 128GB Meta Quest 3S in Xbox Carbon Black and Velocity Green 
- Matching Touch Plus controllers and a limited-edition Xbox Wireless Controller 
- Elite Strap 
- 3 months of Meta Horizon+  
- 3 months of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate  

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

author: Xbox
description:
The chickens are back!
Chicken Run: Eggstraction follows Frizzle on her first solo mission since Dawn of the Nugget to rescue chickens from twisted farms and villainous foes!

You’ll sneak, puzzle-solve, and rally your feathery crew to freedom between hilarious cut scenes packed with fun.

1–2 player co-op
Stealth + strategy + laughs = eggstra fun
Coming soon to Xbox!

author: Xbox
description:
Project Motor Racing, the ultra-authentic racing sim from publisher GIANTS Software and developer Straight4 Studios, will hit the track on November 25th. 

Race across eras in 70+ authentic cars across 10 iconic classes on 27 track layouts. Watch the introduction of its challenging career mode.  

Get ready for the next era of racing simulation and pre-order now!
